page.shortlink: grid component client side websocketsendmessagefail event
page.description: Fires if an attempt was made to send a message to the web socket server, but the message was not sent.

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object passed to the event that contains the following properties:

property.name: message
property.description: A JSON object containing the message from the server.

section.description: To see the information available in the *[js:e.message]* object, use *[js:JSON.stringify]*. For example:
